channel.title: In need of help with coding
channel.description: if anyone can send me a tutorial for new coders I'd really appericate it.I know some basics of hosting and coding but i want to make my own server from a blank source so I dont get called a lecher :) a special thanks to the community of MoparScape

item.title: In need of help with coding
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Nicksworld:

well right now im trying to figure out if i want to do a pi or not.But what has me stuck right now is which would be better for a eco server because pking servers never last and i want my server to actually go somewhere besides the bottom of MoparScape’s server list

You can get a really clean PI from somewhere and it’s pretty good. Or you could use Hyperion, which would be a good base for a 317.

Read full topic
